Title: Relates to suspension or demotion upon the abolition or reduction of positions for labor class and noncompetitive titles; repealer
Summary: Relates to suspension or demotion upon the abolition or reduction of positions for labor class and noncompetitive titles.
LawCode: Amd §§80, 81, 81-a, 81-b, 85 & 131, rpld §80-a, Civ Serv L; amd §3556, Pub Auth L; amd §243, Mil L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, the public authorities law and the military law, in relation to suspension or demotion upon the abolition or reduction of positions for labor class and noncompetitive titles; and to repeal section 80-a of the civil service law relating thereto
